00040 static const double MIN_VARIANCE = 1e-14;
00041 
00042 static void floorClusterWeights(Clusters *clusters, int verbosity)
00043 {
00044     // Make sure all weights are above minimum
00045     for (size_t i = 0; i < clusters->weights.size(); ++i) {
00046         clusters->weights[i] = max(clusters->weights[i], final_weight_min);
00047     }
00048     if (verbosity >= 2) {
00049         cout << "After weight min: " << clusters->tostring() << "\n";
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 static CallAndConfidence doCall(const PXI_ZJMatrix::ROW &pxi_zj,
00055                                 bool isDiploid,
00056                                 const IntensityMatrix::ROW &intensities,
00057                                 const Clusters &clusters,
00058                                 const Matrix2x2 *B,
00059                                 std::string priorName)
00060 {
00061     int biggest = -1;
00062     int nextBiggest = -1;
00063     double biggestVal = -INFINITY;
00064     double nextBiggestVal = -INFINITY;
00065     for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00066         if (pxi_zj[i] > biggestVal) {
00067             nextBiggest = biggest;
00068             nextBiggestVal = biggestVal;
00069             biggest = i;
00070             biggestVal = pxi_zj[i];
00071         } else if (pxi_zj[i] > nextBiggestVal) {
00072             nextBiggest = i;
00073             nextBiggestVal = pxi_zj[i];
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     double pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00078     memset(pvalues, 0, sizeof(pvalues));
00079 
00080     //
00081     if ((biggest==-1)||(nextBiggest==-1)) {
00082       // dump pxi_zj
00083 //      printf("pxi_zj[%d]=[",(int)index);
00084 //      for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00085 //        printf("%s%f",((i!=0)?",":""),pxi_zj[i]);
00086 //      }
00087 //      printf("]\n");
00088       //
00089       return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00090     }
00091 
00092     for (size_t i = 0; i < pxi_zj.size(); ++i) {
00093         // apt-probeset-genotype want a higher value to mean lower likelihood
00094         pvalues[i] = 1 - pxi_zj[i];
00095     }
00096 
00097     if (pxi_zj[biggest] <= 0) {
00098         cerr << "WARNING: pxi_zj[biggest] is not positive: " << pxi_zj[biggest] << " for " << priorName << endl;
00099     }
00100     
00101     double confidence = (pxi_zj[biggest] > 0? pxi_zj[nextBiggest] / pxi_zj[biggest]: 1.0);
00102     double confidenceRelativeToCluster =
00103         calculateConfidenceRelativeToCluster(B[biggest],
00104                                              intensities,
00105                                              clusters.means[biggest]);
00106     confidence = confidence * relative_distance_confidence_weight +
00107         confidenceRelativeToCluster * (1.0 - relative_distance_confidence_weight);
00108 
00109     if (isDiploid) {
00110         switch (biggest) {
00111         case Priors::AA_INDEX:
00112             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AA, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00113         case Priors::AB_INDEX:
00114             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00115         case Priors::BB_INDEX:
00116             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::BB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00117         default:
00118             assert(false);
00119             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00120         }
00121     } else {
00122         switch (biggest) {
00123         case Priors::A_INDEX:
00124             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::AA, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00125         case Priors::B_INDEX:
00126             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::BB, confidence, pvalues, isDiploid);
00127         default:
00128             assert(false);
00129             return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 0.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00130         }
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 static void doCalls(vector<CallAndConfidence> *calls,
00135                     const Clusters &clusters,
00136                     const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00137                     bool isDiploid,
00138                     const string &priorName,
00139                     size_t verbosity)
00140 {
00141     size_t numClusters = (isDiploid? MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS: MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS - 1);
00142     PXI_ZJMatrix pxi_zj(intensities.numRows(), numClusters);
00143     calculatePXI_ZJ(&pxi_zj, clusters, intensities, numClusters);
00144 
00145     Matrix2x2 B[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00146     for (size_t i = 0; i < numClusters; ++i) {
00147         B[i] = makeBMatrix(clusters.vars[i], clusters.covar);
00148     }
00149 
00150     calls->reserve(intensities.numRows());
00151     for (size_t i = 0; i < intensities.numRows(); ++i) {
00152         calls->push_back(doCall(pxi_zj[i], isDiploid, intensities[i], clusters, B, priorName));
00153     }
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 static void adjustPriors(Priors *priors, const IntensityMatrix &intensities, double correctionFactor)
00158 {
00159     double squared = correctionFactor * correctionFactor;
00160 
00161     bool seenNonZeroObservations = false;
00162     for (size_t i = 0; i < priors->getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00163         priors->getPrior(i).m_mean = priors->getPrior(i).m_mean * correctionFactor;
00164         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix = priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix * squared;
00165         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[0][0] =
00166             max(priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[0][0], MIN_VARIANCE);
00167         priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[1][1] =
00168             max(priors->getPrior(i).m_covarMatrix[1][1], MIN_VARIANCE);
00169 
00170         if (priors->getPrior(i).m_numObservations > 0) {
00171             seenNonZeroObservations = true;
00172         }
00173     }
00174     if (!seenNonZeroObservations) {
00175         for (size_t i = 0; i < priors->getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00176             // Don't allow numObservations to be zero, to avoid get NaNs from FP arithmetic
00177             priors->getPrior(i).m_numObservations = 1;
00178         }
00179     }
00180 }
00181 
00182 birdseed::v1::BasicGenotypeCaller::BasicGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00183                                          const Priors &priors,
00184                                          double correctionFactor,
00185                                          const string &priorName,
00186                                          int verbosity,
00187                                          std::ostream *clusterOstrm):
00188     calls(),
00189     index(0)
00190 {
00191     if (intensities.numRows() < MIN_SAMPLES_TO_CLUSTER) {
00192         std::stringstream strm;
00193         strm << "Not enough samples to clusters.  " << MIN_SAMPLES_TO_CLUSTER << " are needed but there are only " <<
00194             intensities.numRows() << ".";
00195         throw BroadException(strm.str().c_str(), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00196     }
00197     
00198     setFitSNPGaussiansVerbosity(verbosity);
00199     if (correctionFactor < 0) {
00200         correctionFactor = calculateSNPSpecificCorrectionFactor(intensities, priors);
00201         if (verbosity >= 2) {
00202             cout.precision(10);
00203             cout << "SNP-specific correction factor for " << priorName << "=" << correctionFactor << endl;
00204         }
00205     }
00206     Priors adjustedPriors(priors);
00207     adjustPriors(&adjustedPriors, intensities, correctionFactor);
00208     if (verbosity >= 2) {
00209         cout << "Priors\n";
00210         for (size_t i = 0; i < adjustedPriors.getNumPriors(); ++i) {
00211             const Prior &prior = adjustedPriors.getPrior(i);
00212             cout << prior.m_mean[0] << " " << prior.m_mean[1] << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[0][0] << " "
00213                  << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[1][0] << " " << prior.m_covarMatrix[1][1] << " "
00214                  << prior.m_numObservations << endl;
00215         }
00216     }
00217     
00218     Clusters clusters = FitSNPGaussianPriors3(intensities, adjustedPriors);
00219     if (clusterOstrm != NULL) {
00220         (*clusterOstrm) << priorName << clusters.standardClusterString() << endl;
00221     }
00222     floorClusterWeights(&clusters, verbosity);
00223     doCalls(&calls, clusters, intensities, priors.isDiploid(), priorName, verbosity);
00224 }
00225 
00226 double birdseed::v1::DummyGenotypeCaller::pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS] = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0};
00227 
00228 CallAndConfidence birdseed::v1::DummyGenotypeCaller::nextCall()
00229 {
00230     return CallAndConfidence(CallAndConfidence::NOCALL, 1.0, pvalues, isDiploid);
00231 }
00232 
00233 birdseed::v1::ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller::ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00234                                                          const Clusters &clusters,
00235                                                          double correctionFactor,
00236                                                          const std::string &priorName,
00237                                                          int verbosity,
00238                                                          std::ostream *clusterOstrm):
00239     calls(),
00240     index(0)
00241 {
00242     bool isDiploid = clusters.k == MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS;
00243     Clusters flooredClusters(clusters);
00244     if (clusterOstrm != NULL) {
00245         (*clusterOstrm) << priorName << clusters.standardClusterString() << endl;
00246     }
00247     floorClusterWeights(&flooredClusters, verbosity);
00248     doCalls(&calls, flooredClusters, intensities, isDiploid, priorName, verbosity);
00249 }
